entry.title: IMDB Search Update
entry.summary: IMDb Tool Update: Country of Origin + Copy-Paste Fixes
entry.content:
IMDb Tool Update: Country of Origin + Copy-Paste Fixesâ€‹

Here is quick update about some recent changes to the IMDb tool on TuÌ„lBOX! This update focuses on improving data clarity and fixing some annoying copy-paste quirks. Hereâ€™s whatâ€™s new:

âœ… Country of Origin Now Includedâ€‹

You can now see the country of origin listed alongside each title. This makes it easier to distinguish between international versions of a film or series at a glanceâ€”especially helpful for teams handling global metadata.

ğŸ” Alternative Titles Copy-Paste Fixâ€‹

Previously, copying alternative titles would result in the order being scrambled or inconsistent. Thatâ€™s now fixed. The tool preserves the display order exactly as shown when copying, so what you see is what you get.

ğŸ”— IMDb Code Copy Trimmed to Last 9 Charactersâ€‹

I've cleaned up the IMDb code copy behavior. Instead of copying the full URL or extra characters, it now smartly copies just the last 9-character IMDb ID (e.g.,tt12345678 -> t12345678)â€”perfect for pasting into internal systems. (This change may be reverted in the future.)

â¸»

These updates are live now. As always, feel free to reach out with feature suggestions or bugs. More improvements coming soon!

entry.title: TuÌ„lBOX V3
entry.content:
ğŸš€ TuÌ„lBOX v3 is Live!â€‹

I'm excited to announce that TuÌ„lBOX v3 is officially live!

This release brings a smoother experience, sharper performance, and improved APIs. The existing tools have been refined based on feedback from real-world use and the entire app has been rebuilt from the ground up. It is now ready to host additional tools as they get released!

âœ… Whatâ€™s New in v3â€‹

  • Improved Speed â€“ Apps load faster and respond more smoothly.
  • Cleaner UI â€“ I redesigned the tools for clarity and flexibility.
  • More Reliable Automation â€“ Updated back-end pipelines to handle complex files more gracefully.
  • Better Metadata Handling â€“ The IMDb tool has a custom built API.

ğŸ’¡ Why This Mattersâ€‹

This update makes it easier to add new tools that are in the works, such as CWR conversion and automated cue sheet stamping.

This is a 00 release, so there will be blood! I mean bugs. Reach out if you run into anything weird.

entry.title: Welcome!
entry.summary: Hi there â€” Iâ€™m so glad youâ€™ve found your way here. This site is both a user guide for TuÌ„lBOX, a growing collection of automation tools, and a living knowledge base for topics in music publishing, royalty collection, and the business of rights management.
entry.content:
Hi there â€” Iâ€™m so glad youâ€™ve found your way here. This site is both a user guide for TuÌ„lBOX, a growing collection of automation tools, and a living knowledge base for topics in music publishing, royalty collection, and the business of rights management.

A little about me: my background is in math and computer science â€” not music publishing. Like many who end up working behind the scenes in entertainment, Iâ€™ve had to pick up a lot on the fly. As I learn the ins and outs of music publishing on the job, Iâ€™ve been organizing what Iâ€™ve found helpful, confusing, or just worth remembering into notes, guides, and tools â€” and adding them here.

Whether youâ€™re new to music publishing, trying to automate a few tedious workflows, or just curious about how it all fits together, I hope this site helps make things a bit clearer.

Thanks for stopping by!
